CTR.Q: What type of chart is this?

VEC.Q: How many series are represented in this stream chart?

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Crimson Plate relative to The Cozy Nook?
SRP.A: Crimson Plate is {above} The Cozy Nook in the vertical direction.

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing The Cozy Nook relative to Sky High Cafe?
SRP.A: The Cozy Nook is {below} Sky High Cafe in the vertical direction.

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing The Cozy Nook relative to Crimson Plate?
SRP.A: The Cozy Nook is {below} Crimson Plate in the vertical direction.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the largest portion to the total table turnover rate?
VPR.A: The series with the largest contribution is {Crimson Plate}.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the smallest portion to the total table turnover rate?
VPR.A: The series with the smallest contribution is {The Cozy Nook}.

EVJ.Q: Which year is Sky High Cafe's minimum Table Turnover Rate in the streamgraph?
EVJ.A: Sky High Cafe's minimum Table Turnover Rate is in {1956}.

EVJ.Q: Which year is Crimson Plate's minimum Table Turnover Rate in the streamgraph?
EVJ.A: Crimson Plate's minimum Table Turnover Rate is in {1954}.

NC.Q: Between 1957 and 1974, did the total Table Turnover Rate experience a larger or smaller change than between 1957 and 1975?
NC.A: The change in total table turnover rate between 1957 and 1974 was {smaller} than between 1957 and 1975.

NC.Q: Was the total Table Turnover Rate in 1954 higher or lower than in 1961?
NC.A: The total table turnover rate in 1954 was {lower} than in 1961.

NC.Q: Was the total Table Turnover Rate in 1961 higher or lower than in 1971?
NC.A: The total table turnover rate in 1961 was {lower} than in 1971.

NC.Q: Was the total Table Turnover Rate in 1954 higher or lower than in 1962?
NC.A: The total table turnover rate in 1954 was {lower} than in 1962.

MSR.Q: In this streamgraph, which one held the dominant position for the longest period of time?
MSR.A: {Crimson Plate} held the dominant position for the longest period of time.

MSR.Q: In this streamgraph, in which year did Sky High Cafe and Crimson Plate first exchange dominant positions?
MSR.A: Sky High Cafe and Crimson Plate first exchanged leading positions in {1955}.
